#summary How to compile v8cgi

= Compiling =

  # Download and build V8, [http://code.google.com/p/v8/]. Create a shared library (`library=shared`).
  # In your v8cgi directory, type `scons`. For a list of available command-line options, try `scons -Q -h`.

== MSVC Express 2008 ==

Try setting these env. paths before compilation:
{{{
set LIB=C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\VC\lib;C:\Program Files\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.0A\Lib;
set LIBPATH=C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\VC\lib;C:\Program Files\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.0A\Lib;C:\Program Files\mysql\Lib\debug;
set INCLUDE=C:\Program Files\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.0A\Include
}}}

(edit to reflect your environment)
